          <title>
            <string language="en">Power for bicycle lights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie für Fahrradlichter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance pour des lumières de bicyclette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência para luzes da bicicleta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza per le luci della bicicletta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη για τα φώτα ποδηλάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencia para las luces de la bicicleta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The diagram shows a bicycle dynamo that generates the alternating current needed to turn on the bicycle lights</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bicycle dynamo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bicycle lights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity generation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">generators</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Diagramm zeigt einen Fahrraddynamo, der den 
Wechselstrom festlegt, der benötigt wird, um die Fahrradlichter 
einzuschalten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le diagramme montre une dynamo de bicyclette qui 
produit du courant alternatif requis pour allumer les lumières de 
bicyclette</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O diagrama mostra um dynamo da bicicleta que gere
a corrente alterna necessitada girar sobre as luzes da bicicleta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo schema mostra una dinamo della bicicletta che 
genera la corrente alternata stata necessaria per accendere le luci 
della bicicletta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δυναμό ποδηλάτων που παράγει 
το εναλλασσόμενο ρεύμα που απαιτείται για να ανοίξει τα φώτα 
ποδηλάτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El diagrama muestra un dínamo de la bicicleta 
que genere la corriente alterna necesitada para encender las luces de 
la bicicleta</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrraddynamo</string>

          <keyword>
